tls:text.tls:line: It overlooks the West Sea.
There are numerous cinnamon trees
There is a plant on this mountain

sense.def: plant of any kind, smaller than bush

tls:text.tls:line: which looks like an onion, but it has green flowers.
which looks like an onion, but it has green flowers.
which looks like an onion, but it has green flowers.
If you eat it, you won't starve.

sense.def: go hungry, not have enough to eat; suffer famine, be starving

tls:text.tls:line: which looks like the paper mulberry but has black markings.
Its blossoms light up everything around it.
Its blossoms light up everything around it.

sense.def: in all four directions 四顧"look in all directions".

tls:text.tls:line: its name is the lost-mulberry.

sense.def: be; be called; run as follows

tls:text.tls:line: its name is the lost-mulberry.
If you wear it in your belt, you won't get lost.

sense.def: carry or wear (adornment or other precious item, e.g. a seal, or a belt) on the waist

tls:text.tls:line: If you wear it in your belt, you won't get lost.

sense.def: lose one's way, be at a loss about where to go (temporarily); allow oneself to get lost

tls:text.tls:line: and many white gibbons.
There are numerous animals on it
There are numerous animals on it

sense.def: generally: four-legged animal of a certain size which are liable to run away when hunted; 百獸"all manner of wild animals"; NB: one may also rear wild animals in parks 養獸

tls:text.tls:line: and many curious fish in its waterways.
as well as many strange serpents
and many curious trees.
is a mountain called Mount Cherrysunny.
and stripes like a tiger, and a scarlet tail.

sense.def: pattern; meaningful or aesthetic pattern; cultural patter

tls:text.tls:line: It makes a noise like the crooning of a human being.
There are numerous dark turtles in it
There are numerous dark turtles in it

sense.def: amphibious land tortoise, long-lived, the meat of which is edible and the shell of which is used in medicine; tortoise shell

tls:text.tls:line: which look like water turtles, but they have a bird's head and a snake's tail.

sense.def: GUOYU: (specifically) small and often poisonous snake; viper; generally: snake

tls:text.tls:line: It has a snake's tail and wings,

sense.def: wings; also transferred military sense: the wings

tls:text.tls:line: If you eat it, you won't suffer from swellings.
You can't climb up it.
which looks like a wild cat, but it has longer fur.

sense.def: long hair on the neck of an animal (typically a horse)

tls:text.tls:line: It is by nature both male and female.

sense.def: in the natural course of events; naturally; automatically; spontaneously; by itself (without any external initiative)

tls:text.tls:line: It is by nature both male and female.
It is by nature both male and female.

sense.def: male living creatures; male of birds or beasts

tls:text.tls:line: and great numbers of curious trees on its north face.
with nine tails and four ears.
Its eyes are on its back.
If you wear some of it in your belt you won't feel fear.

sense.def: be in a state of fear; be under threat which would normally inspire fear; be in fearful trouble

tls:text.tls:line: If you eat it, you won't keep falling asleep.

sense.def: will never (in generalisations); at no time (during a certain period), never (無有 there never are any)

tls:text.tls:line: It makes a noise like a baby.

sense.def: small (still breast-feeding) baby; child (of playing age)

tls:text.tls:line: It can devour humans.

sense.def: have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to

tls:text.tls:line: If you wear some of it in your belt, you won't suffer from delusions.
It you eat it you won't itch.

sense.def: get a skin disease like scabies

tls:text.tls:line: use animals with hair of a single colour; use a single jade ceremonial half-tablet, then ritually bury it;

sense.def: bury sacrificial gifts to the deceased in a sacrificial act; conduct a sacrificial burial of gifts to the deceased

tls:text.tls:line: for the sacrificial rice, use sticky rice;
which looks like a suckling pig
It makes a noise like a dog barking.
which looks like an owl, but it has human hands.
Wherever it appears, numerous officers will be banished from that district.
which looks like a long-tailed ape, but it has four ears.
It makes a noise like the crooning of a human being.
which looks like a human, but it has hog bristles.
which looks like a human, but it has hog bristles.
It lives in a cave and in winter it hibernates.
It lives in a cave and in winter it hibernates.
It makes a noise like wood being chopped.

sense.def: cut, chop, cleave; hew plain; hew away at; cut open

tls:text.tls:line: It makes a noise like a dog's bark.
It makes a noise like a dog's bark.
and on its lower slopes a great amount of the finest dark cinnabar.
and on its lower slopes a great amount of the finest dark cinnabar.
which looks like a ram, but it has no mouth
and it can't be killed.
It looks like a buzzard but it has horns.
and it looks out onto Mount Mound.
Glaring light arises from it at times, and at times it sets.

sense.def: 載...載 sometimes... at other times

tls:text.tls:line: use animals with hair of one colour; use a single ceremonial jade, then ritually bury it;

sense.def: bury sacrificial gifts to the deceased in a sacrificial act; conduct a sacrificial burial of gifts to the deceased

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever there will be order there will be peace over all under the sky.
There is a cave on this mountain out
Its birds are mostly cuckoos.
Among the animals here are numerous rhinoceros of two kinds, black bears and brown bears.

sense.def: wild buffalo; rhinoceros; (by synecdoche, pars pro toto>) their hide

tls:text.tls:line: use one hundred lapis lazuli;

sense.def: bury sacrificial gifts to the deceased in a sacrificial act; conduct a sacrificial burial of gifts to the deceased

tls:text.tls:line: Among its animals are numerous tigers, leopards, and two kinds of rhinoceros.

tls:text.tls:line: Among its animals are numerous tigers, leopards, and two kinds of rhinoceros.

sense.def: wild buffalo; rhinoceros; (by synecdoche, pars pro toto>) their hide

tls:text.tls:line: Whenever it appears, there will be peace and order over all under the sky.
Its animals are mostly the two kinds of rhinoceros.

sense.def: wild buffalo; rhinoceros; (by synecdoche, pars pro toto>) their hide

tls:text.tls:line: Awe Osprey turned into a huge osprey.
Drum also turned into a hill pheasant.
The deity Old Child lives on this mountain.
it has three heads and six tails, and it is good at [PRONE TO] laughing.

sense.def: be given to V-ing, be an enthusiastic V-er; be prone to V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: it has three heads and six tails, and it is good at [PRONE TO] laughing.
use a lucky jade and bury it;

which looks like an ape, but it has markings on its body.

sense.def: have patterns on; have a pattern on 文身

tls:text.tls:line: It is good at laughing.

sense.def: be given to V-ing, be an enthusiastic V-er; be prone to V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: It is good at laughing.

has snow winter and summer.
usse animals of the same colour; use a male chicken and a pig, and then bury them
